website_summaries.verdict: This backpack is a terrific choice for all of your adventures with your baby.
pros: Features a changing pad, insulated sleeve, and lots of compartments for storing all of your baby's needs
cons: Zippers don't seem to last long

customer_reviews.title: inside torn
customer_reviews.text: inside tore on my wifes bag in 2 months. buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: paul sutton

customer_reviews.title: Going back.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bag for an upcoming hospital stay for my son's surgery. Thought it would be great to pack the things that he would need. I got the bag packed and then on the way to the hospital I noticed the bag is falling apart. Will be returning when we get home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good backpack but I bought this backpack less than a ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good backpack but I bought this backpack less than a month ago and yesterday I found out that the pocket for bottle was broke. I have used it only couple times. I will be looking for warranty
customer_reviews.author: Lizeidy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for a good quality, spacious diaper backpack that both my husband and I can use. I order a few different options to compare and out of all the bags my favorite is the HapTim Diaper Backpack. As you’ll see on my video this bag is good but not my favorite. The con is the design of the bag is just like every other standard backpack, it’s deep pockets are spacious but not ideal for organizing all of your items. The pros are the quality, amount of pockets and it does have bottle insulation and stroller straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Laino

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this is the bag for you!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously LOOOOOOVE this diaper bag. I have three girls under 3, and they’re all in diapers still. I was looking for a big diaper bag because I was sick of carrying two around lol. This bag has SO MUCH ROOM. I have about 10 diapers of each kid’s size (I’m over prepared haha), wipes, extra outfit for each kid, jammies for each, extra shirt for me, sippy cups, bottles, diaper rash cream, snacks, toys, burp cloths, forks/placemats for them (slightly germaphobic when at restaurants hahaha) socks, hats, etc. AND THERE IS STILL ROOM. Don’t hesitate, GET THIS BAG!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money and get a quality made bag.
customer_reviews.text: You certainly get what you pay for with this diaper bag. I purchased this as a gift for my husband for Christmas, so he just started using it... and the buckle already fell off on one of the straps so we can't attach it to anything (stroller, shopping cart, etc.) Also, Dr. Brown's 8oz bottles DO NOT fit in the cooler pack on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart at not even 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Not even 2 month old and the interior fabric is broken and main zipper. I keep it in the car and carried it very little around. I handle all things very gently and was very surprised when it gave in. I am very disappointed as I liked the look of it and that it offers multiple compartments. But looking at this poor quality I would not recommend it to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Nieuwoudt

customer_reviews.title: waste of money, all seams will rip within a few months of conservative use.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle lining area seams ripped within the first week, then the shoulder straps went within the next few months. don't waste your time or money on this. We ended up opting for a LL bean book bag after this and that works great. and little can use it when she grows up.
customer_reviews.author: Avidreadervividreamer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected and didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: When I first received it, it seemed sturdy and I loved the water resistance coating. I've used it for a few months to go to appointments and such during my daily runs and it seemed to do well. After a while it starts to wear. Before I knew my straps popped as I put it on so now I'm without a bag for hospital travels. But overall besides the straps not holding up it was OK.
customer_reviews.author: Markus collier

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not good for me
customer_reviews.text: I find it's hard to organize everything in a way that's easy to grab the individual items as needed*. I also find the insulated pocket to not be very insulated- I put an icepack in it with a bottle and went out for dinner with family, after 3 or so hours the icepack was half melted where in my insulated lunch bag it lasts all day. It does seem well made and it's easy to wipe off anything that's gotten onto it. *I'm a first time Mom so maybe with more practice I'll find it easier or it might be that I'll have this problem with every diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this was the diaper bag of my dreams. I loved all of the different pockets to help keep things easy to find. The bag has torn in two spots (on the seams) and we have only used it for a little over 2 months, and in reality, this break downs to less than 10 trips out and about. The ability to store anything in the pocket with the bottles is eliminated once the bottles are placed inside as it is too narrow. I wish I had purchased a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this I've always had the regular diaper bags you no the one shoulder bags. And I am one to over pack my bags because u never no what's gonna happen u might just need that 3rd outfit. Well the back pack doesn't kill your shoulder and back. This one was a pretty decent price and I liked the color and it's a nice size I can get my pump and about 3 outfits and her miscellaneous stuff that I don't really need but nice to have just in case and I still have room at the top :) and this doesn't kill my back!
customer_reviews.author: Lamin

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Bag Back Pack Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this diaper bag back pack for 2 months now. I absolutely LOVE it! It holds so much and is amazing quality. Its comfortable on your back and looks great! It's made with actual durable back pack material. The zippers are smooth and strong. The insulated pockets keep things COLD. I love everything about this bag! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Daddy" bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I got this bag for my significant other because he wanted a masculine looking baby bag to use. He chose this bag himself. He is pleased with it. We alternate between a "mommy" bag and a "daddy" bag. He is all about packing his "daddy" bag when we go out. I said 5 stars because so far this bag is holding up. Its only been like 2 weeks so we will see. If it happens to fall apart I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: N. Prince

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. So many storage areas that are organized and easy to access. Love the print and especially appreciate the side pocket with the lift up flap for wipes. Has stroller buckles and is comfy to wear. I bought three other bags before this one and sent them back. This is the best diaper backpack I’ve found that is cute AND functional AND reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: KellyAustin

customer_reviews.title: Love the space this thing has
customer_reviews.text: Love the space this thing has. Love the 2 built in wet bags and all the pockets. I've had it about six months now and use it at least twice a week if not more. Only down fall is that a couple of the zipper pulls have fallen off. I can get them back on my myself with a little force, but I took off a star for that as it isn't too terribly old yet.
customer_reviews.author: maddi

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it lost a star was because I wish it had a larger opening so you could more easily see what's inside when you open it up. Otherwise, so many pockets and places to put things you might forget where you put them! Comfortable to wear as well, great diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great bag even if not for baby!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best backpack I've ever used. I'm using it as a camera bag rather than for its intended purpose of tending to a baby. I've added some pictures. The pocket closest to the wearer's back is hard to see in the pictures, but one side is a net divided into two sections and the opposite side is a padded half that would be ideal for a laptop or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ORDER IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this bag and ready for it to get here! It is so wonderful with all the pockets that it doesn't become a black hole as my other bags and backpacks did. I nurse and pump, so the insulated pockets are perfect for keeping a bottle warm or cold so that i don't lose milk (and cry.. haha). I just cannot say enough about the amount of pockets. It's not a huge main compartment which i think is beneficial in that i dont over pack or bring unnecessary stuff. It makes me be organized and i need that in my life! Love the quality and the PRINT!!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Balleza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag has plenty of space and every compartment you could need. It is very well thought out, I think it must have been designed by a parent. Diaper backpacks are infinitely more comfortable and manageable than diaper bags and this one is particularly well made. We will still be using if long after our littlest is out of diapers! Bonus: husbands aren't embarrassed to carry this one around!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Well-made but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was very well-made and attractive. However, I found it to be quite heavy while empty and worried about struggling with the weight when filled to capacity. This wouldn't be a worry for anyone with their own transportation, but for those of us who take public transport - find something lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Thurzday_Next

customer_reviews.title: I love the backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband both love this diaper bag! This is definitely the best diaper bag! It has a plenty of space for the baby stuffs and more for my own stuffs to carry, and it is waterproof. I also love the fact that you can attach the backpack to the stroller, which is very convenience. We also love the unisex design that we both can wear. Good product for a good price! We are 100% satisfied on this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! It’s got a ton of compartments to keep everything organized. The only reason I am Not giving it 5 stars is because both of the stroller straps broke the week I got it. The plastic connecting pieces fell off and now I can’t attach it to the stroller. Otherwise, I love this bag and it’s super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Acord-Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Travel friendly.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has saved the husband and I many times when we were traveling. It's easy to use. Keeps the milk cold and has so much room for diapers and clothes. We actually put our laptop or iPad in there just in case we need to do some work or keep our daughter occupied. There's even a waterproof side where we put all her dirty clothes. There's also a place for wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Onexliddoxangel

customer_reviews.title: Its big, lots of storage, impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome diaper backpack! I shopped around about a week; comparing all the features and designs. I chose this one because it was feminine enough for me to carry; but masculine enough for my husband. When i recieved the bag I immediately transferred my diaper bag over and was pleasantly suprised at how much larger this bag is! Its a full sized backpack! The flap for the wipes is great! I love the compartment for wet/soiled clothes in the front. The usb port has a reverse on the inside that will be perfect for a power bank for electronics! Im overall impressed!
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaAnn

customer_reviews.title: BEST DIAPER BAG AT A STEAL PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: I was searching around for a diaper bag for a while. I bought myself another diaper bag on amazon, which I'm not totally satisfied with. This is the diaper bag I bought for my husband. When we received it, I was really jealous of this diaper bag. So many spaces to put things in and I just found out recently after having the bag for 4 months that there is a secret zippered compartment on the bottom of the bag! I am planning to buy another one of these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Abellada

customer_reviews.title: Cute, study, highly-functional bag
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction so it seems like it will last. Even though it's sturdy, it's not too heavy/bulky. Nice insulated areas as well as a separate pocket for damp/soiled items. The back has vents (inspired by hiking backpacks, I suppose) and that's rare to find on diaper bags. Overall, I'm quite pleased. This gray and white lantern design comes with the USB charging port which is kind of cool though I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is phenomenal quality. I would say it’s amazing quality for the price but price has nothing to do with it. It looks and feels like it could easily be a $90 backpack. It’s sturdy, great color (I bought the heathered gray), and has plenty of pockets without feeling too bulky. The insulation in some of the pockets is another great quality about the backpack as well as a changing pad and detachable insulated bottle holder. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sarahdahl

customer_reviews.title: We were excited about this diaper bag when we got ...
customer_reviews.text: We were excited about this diaper bag when we got it, but we've only used it for about a month and the stitching inside the side pocket had come undone, allowing items to get lost in the "inside" of the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a larger diaper bag. I have two kids, both in cloth diapers. This bag has lots of pockets but overall is too small. I tried to fit a wrap, wet bag, two diapers, wipes, three burp rags, and a bunch of breast pads and could barely close it. When one pocket is full, it bulges into the area of the adjacent pockets and greatly reduces their capacity. This is a well made, attractive backpack but didn’t meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love all the compartments and it seems durable. I read a few reviews saying zipper broke and other stuff fell apart but it seems like a very study material and zippers! I am so glad I bought it! It's heat for are all day trips to the MX track. I have enough room for 6 bottles, 3 changes of clothes diapers, wipes, meds, toys, my wallet and more!
customer_reviews.author: kanderson

customer_reviews.title: So glad that we upgraded from a shoulder diaper bag to ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad that we upgraded from a shoulder diaper bag to a backpack, life is so much easier! This bag has lots of compartments to keep all of your baby needs in separate areas. We didn't start using it until we were out of the bottle stage, but we love it for snacks, water bottles, toys, coloring tools, change of clothes, and diapers. It is a little bulky with all of the insulation, but overall it is a great purchase and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: There are so many pockets for whatever you could possible need. Comfy fit when you wear it and the size of the big pocket is perfect to keep everything you'd need. Not to girly for the men to carry. Super easy to toss into the wash and clean. Best diaper bag I've used
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing what your baby needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first diaper bag I've boughten for my self. It has a lost of space and storage for everything you need in a diaper bag. I love that it's a backpack (makes life so much easier.) It's so easy to organize everything. It can hook up to your stoller, so you don't have to constantly wear the back pack when you're going for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Nickers

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is coming undone already!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months and the internal stitching is already coming apart. Sucks cause I spent more hoping it was a good quality bag. It looked that way but now I'll have to try and stitch it or have done professionally:/
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag so much! I had purchased one from Target that was an Eddie Bauer for $50 and was very disappointed in the quality - so I searched the internet for something better and this bag did not let me down! I love it so much! Its very light weight and has all the right pockets! I highly recommend this bag! Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna Heard

customer_reviews.title: Pockets galore!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bag. I wanted to get a backpack type diaper bag. I wanted something I could just slip on and not have to worry about slipping forward when I bend over, or fall off my shoulder. Also, since my husband carries it sometimes I wanted something that didn't seem to girly. There is a ton of space and a ton of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Dobias

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic design, clean and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Compact design, lots of compartments, convenient access to wipes (side pocket) and bottle cooler pockets. Bookbag straps are ergonomic and good for posture control. It can become bulky when packing lots of stuff but the zippers are durable and easy to get stuff in/out.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This was 100 times better than I was expecting! It’s hefty, durable, SO MANY POCKETS, I’m not disappointed! I checked the stitching and it looks great. I’m so excited for baby to get here to use it. There’s pockets for bottles, parent bottles, small pockets, insulated pockets, there’s a changing pad, buckles to hook to the stroller. I’m obsessed! Highly recommend. It is not light weight, not heavy, but not super light.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag but very poor quality!!! it fell apart in about 3 months of gentle use. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaperbag!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed by this bag, I paid a lot more for a Laura Ashley bag that resembles this one except less than a year & it has fallen apart. This bag is very durable, strong material & lots of compartments. I’m so excited to give this to my daughter she’s going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks-Twin momma approved!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in yesterday and couldn't wait to get stuff organized. I have 5 month old twins and my current diaper bag was NOT twin friendly. As I'm putting everything in, I'm SO impressed with how much room the bag has, the organization this bags allows and how sturdy it seems to be. I was able to put everything I needed in this bag, AND everything I've usually carry in a secondary bag. And there's still some room. So far, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha M.

customer_reviews.title: Good smaller backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th diaper bag and second backpack one. It is smaller than the first one I got (from Bag Nation) and my kids bottles do not fit in the side insulated pocket. The strap you use to hang it up broke after only a few months and barely being used. Overall a good quality useful bag, better for one kid, maybe two.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this one to be awesome as it looks!!!
customer_reviews.text: So when I first bought it, it was amazing but then not even a couple of weeks the main zipper broke. So I returned it and got it replaced with the same diaper bag. Well since I had to buy another one at Walmart cause I didn’t have a back up. So stayed with the back up, until recently that I needed to wash it, so I started using the new one (the replacement from the damaged one) well GUESS WHAT? Yep the replacement just busted and I’ve only been using it for maybe a week or two no more though.... so yeah I’m very disappointed, especially now that I can’t exchange it 😒 or get my money back ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Muñiz

customer_reviews.title: Bag seemingly durable although storage capacity only moderate
customer_reviews.text: We have been actively using this bag since 3 weeks ago. This is about 20-30% smaller compared to a prior bag we had. It seemingly is made well and has been durable with our limited use of it thus far, although obviously time will tell if the bag holds up. The compartment for keeping a bottle of formula cool is rather small and tough to fit both an ice pack and bottle into the pocket. However, overall this was a positive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joeena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so far I LOVE this diaper bag! There are so many neat pockets, they truly thought of everything and made a spot for it. It is so much easier to carry than the over the shoulder bag I had before. It is also super cute, but not so girly that my husband minds carrying it. I am so very pleased with this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. The color and storage offered. But it does have its flaws. There’s a pocket where it has like three slots for ‘bottles’ but in reality it’s too small for that. I use Avent and Lansinoh bottles. So I use those for storing baby’s socks,mitten, or cap. I do use the pocket outside on the side for the bottle it’s perfect. Wipe pocket is great has well. I find it to have lots of space. Overall a great baby backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great unisex diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love his diaper bag! It's spacious, has a ton of little compartments and keeps bottles at the desired temperature (because of the insulation). The best part (for me) is that my husband doesn't mind carrying it because it just looks like a gray bookbag. Most diaper bags are so girlie that most men wouldn't be caught dead carrying them and then the woman complains because she the one who is always stuck carrying it. This bag solves that problem and it's very durable and trendy.
customer_reviews.author: AMc1029

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, the zippers work well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It has several pockets, to allow for the essentials and separate for the extras. I took off one star, only because the flap on the side does not allow for the wipes to open up. I still end up having to unzip the pocket in order to use the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Dian

customer_reviews.title: Unisex diaper bags that even daddy's would love to carry.
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for my best friends baby shower. Let me just say I am so picky and all she told me was style, possible color and storage options. This bag is very big with one of great organization bags I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesecake

customer_reviews.title: The smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the floral design and quality appears to be good however the chemical smell is so overwhelming that it’s been in my garage for days now with dryer sheets inside. I’ve tried leaving it outside for a couple days. Everything I can think of and nothing will take it away. Thankfully I bought this for hiking cause no way I’d ever use it for a baby with that odor!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I had a 31 organizing bag originally and it worked out okay but it was hard for me to get out the door by myself with the diaper bag and the car seat. I ordered this and it is so much nicer! Everything fits nicely in this bag and my husband has an easier time finding things now. Plus it clips very easily on to the stroller which is an added plus and the clips are built right on the straps so no separate pieces. I’m so happy I ordered this one instead of the others I had looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Vallance

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute backpack. I love using these when I travel around. The only bad thing I have to say about this backpack is when I took it out of the plastic it smelt so badly! I can’t get the smell off 😷 but hopefully it’ll go by time....
customer_reviews.author: Regina Phalange

customer_reviews.title: Loved this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I do not remember when I bought this, but definitely around two years ago. It is still in great shape. Very durable. As far as I know, there are no tears in it. I fit a good amount in the bag and I have loved this diaper bag since I got it. I pack for two kids, so I usually have a fair amount. I love that I can fit my laptop in the bag too. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It has plenty of room and the wipes compartment is the best thing ever! The only thing I would change on it, is the holders for the bottles. They are a bit tight, but do fit. I love this bag more than any other I have tried! For the price, design and quality it is incredible! Your husband won't even mind carrying this thing! LOVE LOVE LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: reviewme

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: We loved the diaper bag at first! Perfect size and color and way easier than the over the shoulder type. Unfortunately it just started falling apart. First a zipper broke. After that the straps started to fray. Now the insulation pockets are all coming apart. Today I finally gave up and put it in the trash. We were hoping to keep using it when our #2 was born. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Tera Heinzerling

customer_reviews.title: So many cool features of this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: So many cool features of this diaper bag. I didn't really use the inner bottle holders because they are hard and inconvenient for me to squeeze bottles into. I love the wipes pocket on the side. I also really like the insulated side pocket and the stroller straps.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Chalk Mama

customer_reviews.title: Apparently charcoal grey is the new black??
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was late. ordered black, but the color isn't black, more of a charcoal grey. however the accessories (diaper changing pad and bottle holder) are true black. Edit: Customer service contacted us, and resolved this issue for us to our complete satisfaction. Turned our initial 2 star review into a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, it fits everything I need without being bulky. The only problem I had and the reason I only gave 4 stars is because it has three pockets for bottles and one of them is smaller than the rest. It fits 2 of my MAAM bottles and the third pocket is too small. I am overall very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 7 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on a diaper bag because I wanted one that my husband could use to. This one seemed to have what we needed, except 7 weeks into it, it’s coming apart. I have had very little outings so far, so it’s not wear and tear. It’s just a deficiency in the way it is put together. I now have to look into another diaper bag very shortly. Disappointed to say the least. Aside from the zipper though, it does great, holds lots of things and keeps things the right temperature as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoli L. Replogle

customer_reviews.title: I really like this backpack as a diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack as a diaper bag. My only complaint is it is pretty heavy without anything in it. All of the pockets make it easy to organize stuff. I wish I would have used a backpack when I had my first three kids in three years. My older kids fight over who gets to carry the diaper bag for their little brother.
customer_reviews.author: 4ksuwildcats

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this daily for almost 3 years. It's still in great shape; no rips and doesn't look dirty. In addition to basic necessities, we have often shoved in a spare pair of shoes, a toddler coat, and snacks for the family without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our trip to Disneyland with a 1 yr old. It was perfect. It fit everything (and then some), was light weight and it has so many pockets!!! It was the perfect bag for our trip. Also loves that it clipped onto the stroller handle bar. It was so great for our trip, that I’ve been using it instead of my Petunia Pickle Bottom. So much lighter and holds everything a 1 yr old needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag backpack
customer_reviews.text: After being gifted two regular designer diaper bags, I was so tired of lugging the bags on my shoulder while trying to run after my toddler. This backpack is a life saver, we love it! Neutral enough for my husband to wear too and it has great storage and pockets. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M.P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitate on buy a backpack as a baby bag at first, but I'm so glad I did. This bag is great. It was many compartments and the best is the side pouches. One is for your wipes with an opening and the other is insulated for sippy cups!! It's a sleek look bag as well. It also has straps that can go on your stolller. I would high recommend this bag. I'm buying it for my best friend for her new baby!
customer_reviews.author: Farran

customer_reviews.title: ***WOW***
customer_reviews.text: This backpack diaper bag is amazing! Never thought I'd wrote wrote a review for a backpack diaper bag but it fits everything and alot of thought went into this and made into a great product. We love it and will recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it and we wound up using it WAY more then the cute but not very practical diaper bag I bought. There are a lot of pockets and is comfortable to wear all day long.
customer_reviews.author: RachieRoo

customer_reviews.title: Floweer Color not same as pic
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag it's very durable and has alof of pockets. Only thing is in the pic made it look like it was more like white or at least light flowers. They r actually beige brownish. So little disappointed in that. Have t decided whether I am going to keep it yet or not! Babies not due till end of February.
customer_reviews.author: HD Home Security

customer_reviews.title: Universal and trendy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a purse/carry on/diaper bag. It worked great! I was able to carry all my things and what my 2 littles needed through the airport and while on vacation! Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: dimensions too high
customer_reviews.text: I find out the shape is not that practical to find the items inside. Too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Confortable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for traveling, I thought a backpack was better than a bag since we were traveling with a umbrella stroller. I should have buy this backpack instead of the diaper bag. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Great design poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bag for only 3 months and the strap is already on its last leg. I’m disappointed because the design is perfect. I also wish the changing mat was a little bigger it covers just enough space for my 9 month old but no room for his rolling and dance moves during a change.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McCord

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Cleans easily and stores a lot. It seems like good quality, but we will see a year from now how it’s holding up. The bottle storage places are uneven in width and the foil lining was sewn in with raw edges out, so it looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack with lots of useful pockets and insulated pockets
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack with lots of useful pockets and insulated pockets. The negative and the reason I wouldn’t buy this again is because there is nowhere for me to put MY water bottle. I like to travel with two for the day and there isn’t even one spot for it.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish..I'm happy I purchased this bag
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is i wish there was a big enough pocket that was insulated and waterproof where i can put a small ice pack into...other than that i absolutely love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: trinity

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this Diaper bag backpack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Diaper bag backpack! Have one of my own. Love it so much I bought it as a baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: JuJuBee

customer_reviews.title: I really love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I really love this diaper bag. With a toddler and a 2 month old, a lot goes into going out. I can fit everything I need in this bag with room to spare. There are clips so you can attach it to the back of the stroller which is super convenient. Water proof pockets for bibs or wet clothes are really great. Everything in the bag is closed off so I don't have to worry about anything falling out. I would recommend this bag to anyone I know whose top priority is functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Baldridge

customer_reviews.title: Wish the pockets had more space
customer_reviews.text: This has lasted me through the first year and a half with one of my kids and is still in perfect condition to get me through my next one. There is just limited space in the biggest pocket.
customer_reviews.author: ❤️MERMAiDMAMA❤️

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Used as Baby Diaper Backpack. Broke within 9 months. The clasp on the strap broke without much use. Just snapped, kinda bummed. Loved it until it broke, would not recommend. Didnt even get us through the first year. A normal backpack is probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cole

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bag with all of the bells!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a male family member so he would have no qualms about carrying a diaper bag. This backpack has all of the necessary compartments for baby bottles, wipes, diapers and clothing. There is even a zippered section at the bottom of the bag for wet items. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Allie P

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backpack. I need for my elderly mother to take all of the nessities with us when we go out. The straps fit perfect on the wheelchair handles or it can clip to the front of the walker. The bottle carrier is a little hard to open but nothing a little wax won't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 7 month now and is still holding up pretty well. I had my doubts since the quality of the material isn’t that impressive but has been pleasantly surprised! Pockets and compartments are all very useful.
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Durability = Bad
customer_reviews.text: Loved this diaper bag but after about 4 months of use, it is falling apart. The bag hasn’t been overfilled or carried anything too heavy so I don’t understand why the shoulder straps tore so quickly and easily. One strap is completely tore off and the other one is hanging by a thread (literally). Good diaper bag but the durability is seriously lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly as described! It’s lightweight yet tough. I had an issue with one of the zippers. I contacted the company and had immediate response. The problem was solved within a few days! Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: hmlane

customer_reviews.title: GREAT diaper backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Gender-neutral, sturdy, holds an infinite number of objects, is lightweight and ergonomic, and doesn't look ridiculous. Can clip onto stroller handles as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan D

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag. Very roomy. Have lots I can put inside the bag. Love that it has holders for the bottles and is also insulation. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: wend

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. I traveled with my nephews and niece to Disney World and this bag came in very handy. It kept their juice boxes and bottles cold. The multiple compartments made my life easy. Love the insulated water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy but be aware of zippers
customer_reviews.text: Zippers on all pockets hang up and you have to fight it to open. We've had it less than a year now and it's held up as far as no rips or tears but the zippers lack a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very durable high quality bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Very great quality. A bag like this in store would be 70 to 100 bucks easy. Has a ton of compartments and the straps are nice and comfy on your shoulders. Only disappointment was the colors were not as bright as the pictures on line. But it's a wonderful bag! Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag. I looked for weeks for a new diaper bag online before purchasing one. I read all the reviews and finally decided on this one. It is pretty sturdy quality and really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag alternative!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! As my baby turned to a toddler my needs from a diaper bag changed and I decided a back pack was our way to go. Found this one and have been super impressed with it. The value and durability for the money is amazing. Quality was perfect and I love the pattern. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MsBetsy

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Size is great! Using it for our now two and 1/2 year old twins! Has held up well and seems easy to clean. (Just tossed it in the washer so we will see. Plenty of pockets and mesh pockets inside to keep things organized. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best bag and customer service experience!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the diaper bag a year ago and it still looks like brand new. There’s not one thread sticking out, the zippers work as new, everything is perfect. I was traveling recently and by accident lost one of the clips on the back and I emailed the company to ask them if they could sell me the spare piece. Next thing I know, they send me a brand new bag! I am fascinated by this company and will recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Has a lot of space, insulated pockets, portable phone charger port, comfortable & adjustable shoulder straps. Definitely worth the money. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Design!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome! Very spacious and really comfortable to wear. The CoolBELL backpack is super functional compared to other bags we looked at. With multiple insulated pockets to store bottles or water and water proofed areas for wet clothes and or diapers makes this bag really useful!
customer_reviews.author: Julio A. Cazares

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: After having our second child we couldn't find a diaper bag that was large enough to carry everything we needed, yet compact enough that is wasn't super bulky. Wish we would have started with this one!! Very durable, tons of great pockets for storage and organization. I love that some of the pockets are lined so if something spills it doesn't get all over the bag. Very pleased with this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Haacke

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and plenty of space.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it’s not to big not to small. I switched to this one from a huge Steve Madden diaper bag. It has so many compartments I don’t know what to feel them up with. The charging port thing doesn’t come with a charging battery pack or anything just a usb cord. Still super convenient Wal-Mart sells portable chargers for $5 so no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: So many pockets
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great if you like to be organized. It has so many pockets it is perfect for snacks, bottles changes often clothes and everything else you need. We have had this bag for several weeks and just discovered a new pocket today. It is very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Great bag especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: bekah88

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this right before my son was born and I absolutely love it. It's light weight and has enough room for my new borns items around with my 3 years things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaperbag
customer_reviews.text: I received this backpack a few weeks ago but have not had the chance to use it yet as my baby is still “cooking”. I am very pleased with the quality of the bag though. Very lightweight and large enough to fit A LOT, zippers function well, and I love how some compartments are insulated. So far no complaints and my husband and I are very pleased with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kassi

product_meta.title: CoolBELL Baby Diaper Backpack With Insulated Pockets/Large Size Water-resistant Baby Bag/Multi-functional Travel Knapsack Include Changing Pad (Grey)
feature_bullets: Bag dimensions: 17.3 x 13.3 x 7.4 inch. Volume: 26 L. Roomy enough for holding items you want to carry for baby.

Lots of functional pockets. Include a side tissue pocket, a side insulated Pockets. Two front waterproof pockets for diaper. In the bottle compartment, include three insulated Milk bottle pockets; A net compartment for towel.; A hidden pocket with zipper for keys. The main compartment for baby¡¯s clothes, shoes, etc.
Include changing pad and an extra insulated sleeve. Convenient for taking care for baby.
Comfortable carrying. A soft foam padding on the back of the bag and the back strap provides a comfortable carrying.

New design stroller strap system. 2 adjustable stroller straps been added to the back straps for fixing the bag to a baby stroller, more duarable than removable stroller straps, you won't forget the take the straps!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,390 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
